Steps.Message: Update at 22:29 - Engineers are on their way. At this point we think the issue is a fault with some equipment in your local substation in the Borrow Road area. Based on how long it usually takes us to complete the required tests and allow our staff to make a safe attempt to restore power, we're currently looking to have everyone back on between 01:00 and 02:00. This is an estimated timeframe, as its possible there could be a more complex issue on our network, but we'll keep you updated with all of our progress until power is restored.

We became aware of a power cut at 21:44. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 22:29 - Engineers are on their way. At this point we think the issue is a fault with some equipment in your local substation in the Borrow Road area. Based on how long it usually takes us to complete the required tests and allow our staff to make a safe attempt to restore power, we're currently looking to have everyone back on between 01:00 and 02:00. This is an estimated timeframe, as its possible there could be a more complex issue on our network, but we'll keep you updated with all of our progress until power is restored.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
